name: RetrieveLegalHolds
description:
Retrieve all legal holds for a case in an organization.

This tool retrieves the list of all legal holds within a specified case for an organization. It is intended for Miro Enterprise plan users with the Enterprise Guard add-on, requiring Company Admin and eDiscovery Admin roles.

parameters.name: maximum_items_in_result_list
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of items to be included in the retrieved list of legal holds.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items in the result list.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization for which to retrieve the list of legal holds within a case.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization for which you want to retrieve the list of legal holds within a case.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the case for which to retrieve the list of legal holds.

value_schema.description: The ID of the case for which you want to retrieve the list of legal holds.

parameters.name: page_cursor
parameters.description: An indicator for paginating results. Leave empty for the first page or use the previous request's cursor for subsequent pages.

value_schema.description: An indicator of the position of a page in the full set of results. To obtain the first page leave it empty. To obtain subsequent pages set it to the value returned in the cursor field of the previous request.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items in the result list.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items in the result list.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: An indicator of the position of a page in the full set of results. To obtain the first page leave it empty. To obtain subsequent pages set it to the value returned in the cursor field of the previous request.

value_schema.description: An indicator of the position of a page in the full set of results. To obtain the first page leave it empty. To obtain subsequent pages set it to the value returned in the cursor field of the previous request.

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization for which you want to retrieve the list of legal holds within a case.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization for which you want to retrieve the list of legal holds within a case.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: The ID of the case for which you want to retrieve the list of legal holds.

value_schema.description: The ID of the case for which you want to retrieve the list of legal holds.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
